scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/css dist/images && npm run optimize-images && cp -r src/* dist/ && npx tailwindcss -i ./tailwind.css -o ./dist/css/style.css --content "./src/**/*.html" --content "./dist/**/*.html" --minify && npm run post-build
scripts.build:local: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 8081 -o
